article.title: Raytheon Awarded Air Armaments Center Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded an $8,796,079 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to procure hardware in the loop facility upgrade and study.Â Air Armaments Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
